title: Where can I write handwritten letters? - Quora

response.answer_text: Where can I write handwritten letters? Where. At home, sitting at a table, paper in front of you, pen in hand and you start writing. Where. g o to a quiet place, the library for example , they have table and chairs, so take your writing pad and pen and write. Can ..everyone can. It's allowed anywhere. There is something very personal about a handwritten letter. When you finish writing, get an envelope put the lettrr inside, seal the envelope, address it to the recipient, put a postage stamp on it, put it in the mail box, and zip you r letter is off along the channels to the clearing house then depending where you send it could take up to a couple of weeks to reach its destination, if going overseas, if local could take about three days. Enjoy the joy of letter writing.

This is a not-fully developed question. If you mean on what surface can you write handwritten letters, well, pick any smooth surface that is about elbow high. If you mean in what noise conditions can you write, that is up to your own sense of discipline. Can you write in high-noise areas? Do you need quiet? Do you need music or the television playing? Or do you mean something else? More clarity would be nice.
